info.title: Scogger
info.author: Scognito
info.details:
The goal of the game is to make the frog jump over all the tree trunks.

The only available direction the frog can move are forward, left and right (no diagonals), with no jump distance limit!

Remember that the frog cannot jump backward!

Clean the stage for going to the next level (they are 10 out 100 random)!

Wiimote or gamecube pad can be used:

Move the frog with wiimote, wiimote d-pad, or gamecube d-pad.
Restart level pressing B.
Toggle music with (-) or L trigger.
Skip level with (+) or R trigger (but you have to do the "konami trick" at title screen!).
